description.value: At 1st level, your melee attacks are considered good-aligned weapons for the purpose of bypassing damage reduction. Furthermore, when you deal damage with a melee attack to an evil outsider, you deal an additional 1d6 points of damage. This additional damage stacks with effects such as @Compendium[pf1.spells.zujht80bgjdk9cyb]{Align Weapon} and those granted by a weapon with the holy weapon special ability.
